long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pluma allows you to spellcheck and edit text as you browse. Proofread and mockup changes with immediate visual feedback. Save time by not having to use slower document and image editing programs to explore what-if possibilities.

FEATURES

• Edit text as you browse.
• Spellcheck when editing.

LIMITATIONS

Editing and spellchecking are provided by your browser. The more capable your browser is, the better your experience will be. 

For a full list of limitations, please read the included guide after installing.

PRIVACY

Pluma respects your privacy.
https://nightmode.fm/software/pluma/privacy

DISCLAIMER

This software is provided under a no-contact and no-support model. Do not contact the author, for any reason, even if you think it would benefit the author.
